abstract.t: This memo describes the use of Kerberos [RFC4120] service with SimpleNetwork Management Protocol (SNMP) to authenticate users, authorizethem to access specific MIB objects and to encrypt data forconfidentiality. User authorization information is securelyencapsulated inside the AuthorizationData field in a Kerberos ticket.The recommendations of this memo may be eventually extended toapplications other than SNMP.
